name: C172 Checklists
description:
*** This app is for entertainment purposes only! We are not affiliated with Cessna or Textron or any airline ***

The C172 Checklist app brings paperless checklists straight to your palm. Checklists are complete for generic standard operations of an C172 series aircraft. This app is ideally suited for pilots flying on Flight Simulators at home, especially for Flight Simulator add-ons such as C172.

* The checklists contained in this app are for C172 with G1000 glass cockpits! *

Features:

- C172 standard operating checklists
- Very easy and intuitive user interface
- Simple check-marking system to mark completed items
- Use in any orientation, our checklists adapt to your needs
- Fly at night with Dark Mode
